data.title: R Hell: "Casper and the Angels"
data.meta_description: In this series, Brad spotlights & reviews some of the weirder titles from his collection, that don't necessarily fall into any specific categories.
data.text:
Hey remember the time Casper the Friendly Ghost was partnered with two Space Cops in the 22nd Century to bust common criminals, along with a wise cracking sidekick named Harry Scary?

DVD-R Hell

In this series, Brad spotlights & reviews some of the weirder titles from his collection, that don't necessarily fall into any specific categories.
